name: Allen'sSimpleCalculator
0:
”Alexa open allens simple calculator”
”Alexa tell allens simple calculator to set first number to 10”
”Alexa tell allens simple calculator to set second number to 15”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: allen's simple calculator
des:
You now can do simple math with any two numbers with your voice only. Example Voice User Interface flow:
"Alexa open allen's simple calculator"
"Alexa tell allen's simple calculator to set first number to 10"
"Alexa tell allen's simple calculator to set second number to 15"
"Alexa tell allen's simple calculator add"
"Alexa tell allen's simple calculator subtract"
"Alexa tell allen's simple calculator multiply"
"Alexa tell allen's simple calculator divide"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
